name: Tamers Cyberworld
description:
This is a game for those who want to be the legendary monster tamers. Game is based on the hugely popular franchise of monsters.

Game features:
【Classic Storyline】
Familiar monsters, popular characters but entire new world! Experience the story in personally once more!

【Monster】
More than hundreds of monsters for you unlocking, training and evolving. Play the every justice tamers role to adventure the monster world. Continue the legendary tamer’s road by your own!

【Unique】
The unique monster evolution system, PVP, guild construction gameplay, skills, etc. ultra-multi-feature play brings infinite fun.

【The vast world】
Dark Forest, Adventure Island, Resource factories, Arena, Trials, Guilds, Parkour, Fishing activities start from here and many other gaming systems, the amazing world is waiting for your adventure
